title: The World Jumper
description: The Evers Series delivers a wholesome, uplifting experience!As the Evers Series reaches its climax, Lola and Devlin uncover more about their peculiar heritage and ancestors and spend some time with the High Elves on Summerset Isle, —a world that no longer adheres to the constrictive notions of time and space. Between kidnappings, break-ins, the loss of her parents, and newfound magical abilities, will Lola find the happy ending she deserves?
author: Marie-Hélène Lebeault
